property_id: Msa Blk XIII. 106 & 109. Off Lumumba Rd. Makupa

property_description.plot_and_site_works: These are contiguous rectangular/trapezoidal-shaped, fairly level sandy/coral soil plots whose boundaries are marked by building lines. Access into the properties is via a frontage to the immediate access road.
property_description.services: Mains water and electricity services are connected to the property. Drainage is to a septic tank. Immediate access road is tar-surfaced. Water supply is augmented by a borehole on Plot No. 106.
property_description.improvements: The plots are jointly developed with a double-storey go-down, an ablution block and a changing room block.

go_down.construction: Roof: Reinforced concrete or metal-trussed covered with asbestos. Walls: Reinforced concrete beams and columns in filled with coral stonewalls rendered and colour-washed externally, plastered and painted internally. Ceilings: Reinforced concrete plastered and painted undersides. Floors: Reinforced concrete slab finished in ceramic tiles or cement screed. Windows: Glazed wooden frame reinforced with wire mesh or metal grilles. Doors: External doors are metal plate type reinforced with a metal grille and mesh. Internal doors are timber flush types. Staircase: Reinforced concrete risers and treads finished in terrazzo and provided with metal handrails.
go_down.accommodation: Ground Floor: Office; Washroom with a WHB and a WC; Storage/old manufacturing area; First Floor: Landing to: 2No. storage rooms; Old manufacturing area;

ablution_block.accommodation: Cloakroom with WC and an overhead shower; Cloakroom with a WC; External WHB.

market_assessment.general_remarks: This is a double-storey godown located in Makupa area of Mombasa County. The building is currently unoccupied. The neighbourhood is characterised by a combination of light industrial and commercial properties. There is a growing trend around the neighbourhood where industrial/commercial properties are undergoing redevelopment to high-rise apartment buildings. The demand for similar properties in this neighbourhood is moderate either for use as light industrial/warehouse facilities, offices or redevelopment to high-rise apartments. There are currently no obvious environmental issues including contaminated land either on the subject or on an adjoining site that materially affect the value of the property.
market_assessment.public_utility_user: We have perused relevant survey plans; it is our considered opinion that the said properties have not been set aside for public use/water catchment area. To the best of our knowledge, the subject properties are not government land and has not been reserved for public utility user. We confirm that the property is not listed in the Report of the Commission of Inquiry into the Illegal/Irregular Allocation of Public Land (Ndungu Report) Annexes Volumes 1, 2 & 3. We further confirm that the land is not adversely mentioned in the National Land Commission (NLC) Kenya Gazette Notice No. 6862 of 17th July 2017, 12526 of 22nd December 2017, 2032 and 2033 of 2nd March 2018 and 1547 of 15th February 2019. The land is not on riparian reserve/wetland.
market_assessment.planning_highway_statutory_consideration: In our opinion we don’t foresee any significant prospect of or potential for change of use of the subject properties or those in the vicinity, which could materially affect the value of the subject property in the past or in future. The current user of the property conforms to its stipulated use.
market_assessment.environmental_issues: There are currently no other obvious visible environmental issues including contaminated land either on the subject or on an adjoining site that materially affect the value of the property. A detailed environmental impact assessment report would verify this in greater details.
market_assessment.income_capitalisation_approach_descripti: This method estimates value based on the property’s anticipated income from the perspective of a typical investor in the market place. The net operating income is capitalised by an appropriate capitalization rate based on a reasonable expectation of return on the investment appropriate to the market and the rate of return investors would expect on net operating income in order to invest in similar properties.
market_assessment.market_value_definition: The market value returned here below would be the expected/estimated realization price of the property if placed in the market on the valuation date on a willing buyer willing seller basis at an arm’s length transaction.

valuation_methodology: Land value separate from the building, fixtures and fittings.
Capital Value upon completion according to specifications.
Forced Sale value with special assumptions (including where applicable)
